node.title: Jehnny Beth - To Love Is To Live
node.description: Jehnny Beth (frontwoman of Savages and half of the lo-fi duo John & Jehn) dropped her solo debut album. it is moving between cinematic and industrial sounds, between power and vulnerability. she and Johnny Hostile also released a collection of erotic short stories, Crimes Against Love Manifesto (C.A.L.M.).
node.release: To Love Is To Live was released on 20lo7 music on June 12, 2020.
